controller

Class BinDecController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BinDecController

  • public class BinDecController
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes input from user through console, text file or command line arguments, converts passed values, stores them in model and calls methods from view to show results and inform user
    Since:
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Michal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert(int arraySize, java.lang.String[] values)
      Converts all elements of passed table from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system or from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system (can be both decimal and binary in one array).
      void convert(java.lang.String value)
      Converts value from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system or from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system.

      Converts from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system.
      private java.lang.String convertDecToBin(java.lang.String decValue)
      Converts value from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system.
      void runConsoleInterface()
      Runs graphical user interface in console, that lets user to type desired number to be converted or path to .txt file with numbers to be converted in it.
      private java.lang.String takeInputFromConsole()
      Takes input from user.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public void convert(java.lang.String value)
        Converts value from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system or from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system.
        Parameters:
        value - String representation of value to be converted.

      • convert

        public void convert(int arraySize,
                    java.lang.String[] values)
        Converts all elements of passed table from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system or from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system (can be both decimal and binary in one array).
        Parameters:
        arraySize - Size of passed array.
        values - Array of String representations of values to be converted.

      • runConsoleInterface

        public void runConsoleInterface()
        Runs graphical user interface in console, that lets user to type desired number to be converted or path to .txt file with numbers to be converted in it. Typing 'q' results in exiting loop and function.

      • takeInputFromConsole

        private java.lang.String takeInputFromConsole()
        Takes input from user.
        Returns:
        Value passed by user.

      • convertDecToBin

        private java.lang.String convertDecToBin(java.lang.String decValue)
        Converts value from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system.
        Parameters:
        decValue - String representation of value to be converted.
        Returns:
        String representation of converted value.

      • convertBinToDec

        private java.lang.String convertBinToDec(java.lang.String binValue)
        Converts from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system.
        Parameters:
        binValue - String representation of value to be converted.
        Returns:
        String representation of converted value.
